name: Mysteries Without Answers Trivia Quiz | General | 10 Questions

questions.text: Legend has it that treasure is buried on Oak Island. This island is located off the coast of:
questions.explanation:
Canada.

	It's off the coast of Eastern Canada, near Nova Scotia.

questions.text: An individual who investigated the Roswell UFO incident:
Everyone has heard of the Loch Ness Monster. Where is Loch Ness?
Stories have circulated that suggest that Amelia Earhart was taken by the Japanese to:
questions.explanation:
Saipan.

	She was trying to land on Howland Island - she didn't make it.

questions.text: Amelia Earhart's navigator on her last flight was:
The 'Lost Dutchman Mine' is said to be located in these mountains:
The Nazca lines have puzzled many researchers. Where are they located?
The Himalayan people who claim to have a degree of familiarity with the 'Abominable Snowman' are:
The Ghost Ship's crew that mysteriously disappeared:
questions.explanation:
Mary Celeste.

	Also known as Marie Celeste
